meanings.sent1: He bought a new suit from the menswear section.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide selection of menswear for sale.
meanings.sent3: The menswear store was so popular, it was always packed with customers.
meanings.sent4: His style was like a canvas, with menswear as the paint.
meanings.sent5: The menswear collection was a symphony of colors and fabrics.

meanings.definition: The business of designing and selling men's clothing.
meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a career in menswear after studying fashion design.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in high-end menswear for executives.
meanings.sent3: The competition in the menswear industry was fierce but exciting.
meanings.sent4: His success in menswear was a testament to his passion and hard work.
meanings.sent5: The world of menswear was a dynamic and ever-evolving market.
